import pandas as pd
import glob
dir_list = glob.glob('./Fitbit/ShiYangLee/Sleep/Daily Heart Rate Variability Summary -*.csv')
dfs = []
for file in dir_list:
    data = pd.read_csv(file)
    dfs.append(data)
temp = pd.concat(dfs, ignore_index = True)
temp.head()
timestamp rmssd nremhr entropy
0 2022-03-14T00:00:00 47.836 55.187 2.793
1 2022-04-06T00:00:00 61.240 51.390 2.882
2 2022-04-07T00:00:00 47.564 55.114 2.655
3 2022-03-11T00:00:00 56.874 53.753 2.895
4 2022-03-27T00:00:00 66.738 52.951 3.123 
temp.set_index('timestamp', inplace = True)
temp = temp.sort_index()
